title: Pu Revu
preview: Google Firebase webapp for desktop and mobile.
about: PuRevu is a location based public restroom rating webapp. This app was built in week 8 of the UNH coding bootcamp with a team of 4. It uses firebase to store user ratings, comments and locations for quick retrieval by zip code. There are also cors supported api's that call for 'dad jokes, weather and New York Times articles' for user entertainment.

title: Engram Collector
preview: A front-end webapp numbers game built with javaScript, Bootstrap, and jQuery.
about: Crystal Collector is a front-end application game built with jQuery and BootStrap.

title: Plexx
preview: A full-stack webapp game built with ReactJS, Phaser, Materialize css and Express.
about: Plexx is a full-stack webapp project built with a team of 4. It features a game built with Phaser 2, and a user membership built with PassportJs for storing user scores.

title: Eat-Da-Burger
preview: A full-stack single page webapp built with mySQL, jQuery, Bootstrap and Express.
about: 'Eat-Da-Burger' is a restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. It uses mySQL and Handlebars to render the page with all the stored burgers.

title: Mongo Scraper
preview: A full-stack web scraper built with mongoDB, Handlebars, Express, and Cherio.
about: 'Mongo Scraper' is a web scraper that lets users view and leave comments on the latest articles from Hacker News and Echo JS. It uses Cheerio to scrape a site, MongoDB for storing saved articles and notes while Handlebars renders the app.

title: Blue It
about: 'Blue It' is a social networking webapp built with a team of 4. Users and create accounts, make short message posts, and search for other users.

title: MERN React Portfolio
preview: This portfolio is built with MongoDB and React, intended to showcase my recent projects as a web developer.
about: This Project is built with React in the frontend with NodeJs and Express acting as the server while. Axios is used to handle the AJAX requests to carry most of the sites content stored in MongoDB.
